  • Constructor Details

    • Carta

      public Carta(int valor, String palo, Tipo tipo) throws NoEnLaBaraja
      Constructor for the Carta class.
      Parameters:
      valor - The value of the card.
      palo - The suit of the card.
      tipo - The type of the card.
      Throws:
      NoEnLaBaraja - if the card is not in the deck based on its value and type.
